idleTtl.description: The amount of time in seconds after which sessions will cease if no requests are received. Valid values are `300` – `3600` (5–60 minutes). The value must be less than or equal to `maximum_ttl`.

maximumTtl.description: The maximum amount of time in seconds to consider requests from the viewer as being part of the same session. Valid values are `300` – `3600` (5–60 minutes). The value must be greater than or equal to `idle_ttl`.
